alert.note: Alert for Tarrant; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:46PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wise, southwestern Denton and northwestern Tarrant Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 646 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pecan Acres, or near Briar. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Saginaw, Azle, Eagle Mountain, Briar, Pecan Acres, Justin, Reno, Pelican Bay, Rhome, Haslet, New Fairview, Aurora and Newark. This includes Interstate 35W between mile markers 59 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
